notices.title: Semester Exam Time Table
notices.content: The time table for upcoming semester examinations has been released. Students are advised to check the examination schedule and prepare accordingly.

notices.title: Workshop on AutoCAD
notices.content: A hands-on workshop on AutoCAD software will be conducted for final year students. Registration is mandatory.

notices.title: Industrial Visit - Toyota Motors
notices.content: Industrial visit to Toyota Motors manufacturing unit has been arranged for mechanical engineering students.

notices.title: Scholarship Applications Open
notices.content: Merit-based scholarship applications are now open for all courses. Last date for submission is 30th August 2025.

notices.title: Programming Contest Results
notices.content: Results of the inter-department programming contest have been declared. Congratulations to all winners!

notices.title: Circuit Design Competition
notices.content: Annual circuit design competition for Electronics and Electrical students. Prize money up to Rs. 10,000.

notices.title: Power System Lab Schedule
notices.content: New schedule for Power System Laboratory has been updated. Check the timetable for revised timings.
